column4: any good software for wireless network cards like netstumbler(for windows)  ?
any good software for wireless network cards like netstumbler(for windows)  ?
Many of us have no idea what netstumbler is. What do you want to do?
use wireless network, see SSID's MAC's and stuff
Do you know if your wireless card is support?
no!
it's a wireless USB adaptor
*cringe*
What model is it?
XWL-11guzx
X-Micro wlan 11g usb adaptor
It seems it should be supported.
thats good :) now what !

Er... Assuming the modules is enabled by default (I'm not sure it is -- not on Ubuntu to test), it should be working! Hm... IRC is not the best way to do stuff like this. :) It's freaking loud in here...
Look into http://zd1211.ath.cx/
It includes install information.
thanks mate i'll have a look at that
Alright man, good luck! This stuff isn't always easy at first. :)
one more thing pleas, i'm following the guide but 'MAKE' is a unknown command!!
Oh heavens.
